section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a declaration of paternity in an order is final.
A declaration of paternity may be modified or set aside:

Notwithstanding subparagraph (i) of this paragraph, a declaration of paternity may not be modified or set aside if the individual named in the order acknowledged paternity knowing he was not the father.

text.section: Except for a declaration of paternity, the court may modify or set aside any order or part of an order under this subtitle as the court considers just and proper in light of the circumstances and in the best interests of the child.
